text:
"Pocoyo" (Spanish: Pocoyó) is a children's television series. Pocoyo does not talk very much. He has a few friends, including an elephant named Elly, a bird named Sleepy Bird and a duck named Pato.
Episode list.
To date two series have been produced, each with 52 episodes. There is also an unreleased episode entitled "The See-Saw".
